Source code for openaerostruct.common.lifting_surface

from __future__ import print_function, division, absolute_import



[docs]class LiftingSurface(object):


[docs]    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name



[docs]    def set_mesh(self, mesh):
        """ Accepts external mesh. """
        self.mesh = mesh



[docs]    def initialize_mesh(self, num_points_x, num_points_z_half, airfoil_x, airfoil_y):
        self.num_points_x = num_points_x
        self.num_points_z_half = num_points_z_half
        self.airfoil_x = airfoil_x
        self.airfoil_y = airfoil_y



[docs]    def set_mesh_parameters(self, chord, twist, sweep_x, dihedral_y, span, distribution, section_origin):
        self.chord = chord
        self.twist = twist
        self.sweep_x = sweep_x
        self.dihedral_y = dihedral_y
        self.span = span
        self.distribution = distribution
        self.section_origin = section_origin



[docs]    def set_optimization_discretizations(self, twist_bspline, sec_z_bspline, chord_bspline, thickness_bspline):
        self.bsplines = {
            'chord_bspline' : (2, 2),
            'twist_bspline' : (2, 2),
            'sec_x_bspline' : (2, 2),
            'sec_y_bspline' : (2, 2),
            'sec_z_bspline' : (2, 2),
            'thickness_bspline' : (2, 2),
            'radius_bspline' : (2, 2),
            }

        self.bsplines['twist_bspline'] = twist_bspline
        self.bsplines['sec_z_bspline'] = sec_z_bspline
        self.bsplines['chord_bspline'] = chord_bspline
        self.bsplines['thickness_bspline'] = thickness_bspline



[docs]    def set_structural_properties(self, thickness, radius, E, G, spar_location, sigma_y, rho):
        self.thickness = thickness
        self.radius = radius
        self.E = E
        self.G = G
        self.spar_location = spar_location
        self.sigma_y = sigma_y
        self.rho = rho



[docs]    def set_aero_properties(self, factor2, factor4, cl_factor):
        self.CL0 = 0.
        self.CD0 = 0.

        self.factor2 = factor2
        self.factor4 = factor4
        self.cl_factor = cl_factor
